                <li>
  <a class="HeaderMenu-dropdown-link lh-condensed d-block no-underline position-relative py-2 Link--secondary" target="_blank" data-analytics-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Header dropdown (logged out), Solutions&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;click to go to White papers, Ebooks, Webinars&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;ref_cta:White papers, Ebooks, Webinars;&quot;}" href="https://resources.github.com">
      White papers, Ebooks, Webinars

  <modal-dialog data-action="close:qbsearch-input#handleClose cancel:qbsearch-input#handleClose" data-target="qbsearch-input.searchSuggestionsDialog" role="dialog" id="search-suggestions-dialog" aria-modal="true" aria-labelledby="search-suggestions-dialog-header" data-view-component="true" class="Overlay Overlay--width-large Overlay--height-auto">
      <h1 id="search-suggestions-dialog-header" class="sr-only">Search code, repositories, users, issues, pull requests...</h1>
    <div class="Overlay-body Overlay-body--paddingNone">
      
          <div data-view-component="true">        <div class="search-suggestions position-fixed width-full color-shadow-large border color-fg-default color-bg-default overflow-hidden d-flex flex-column query-builder-container" style="border-radius: 12px;" data-target="qbsearch-input.queryBuilderContainer" hidden="">
          <!-- '"` --><!-- </textarea></xmp> --><form id="query-builder-test-form" action="" accept-charset="UTF-8" method="get">
  <query-builder data-target="qbsearch-input.queryBuilder" id="query-builder-query-builder-test" data-filter-key=":" data-view-component="true" class="QueryBuilder search-query-builder" data-min-width="300" data-catalyst="">
    <div class="FormControl FormControl--fullWidth">
      <label id="query-builder-test-label" for="query-builder-test" class="FormControl-label sr-only">
        Search
      </label>
      <div class="QueryBuilder-StyledInput width-fit " data-target="query-builder.styledInput">
          <span id="query-builder-test-leadingvisual-wrap" class="FormControl-input-leadingVisualWrap QueryBuilder-leadingVisualWrap">
            <svg aria-hidden="true" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" data-view-component="true" class="octicon octicon-search FormControl-input-leadingVisual">
    <path d="M10.68 11.74a6 6 0 0 1-7.922-8.982 6 6 0 0 1 8.982 7.922l3.04 3.04a.749.749 0 0 1-.326 1.275.749.749 0 0 1-.734-.215ZM11.5 7a4.499 4.499 0 1 0-8.997 0A4.499 4.499 0 0 0 11.5 7Z"></path>
</svg>
          </span>
        <div data-target="query-builder.styledInputContainer" class="QueryBuilder-StyledInputContainer">
          <div aria-hidden="true" class="QueryBuilder-StyledInputContent" data-target="query-builder.styledInputContent"></div>
          <div class="QueryBuilder-InputWrapper">

            <input id="query-builder-test" name="query-builder-test" value="" autocomplete="off" type="text" role="combobox" spellcheck="false" aria-expanded="false" aria-describedby="validation-0e88beed-a62f-489d-9076-26d5e4635b07" data-target="query-builder.input" data-action="
          input:query-builder#inputChange
          blur:query-builder#inputBlur
          keydown:query-builder#inputKeydown
          focus:query-builder#inputFocus
        " data-view-component="true" class="FormControl-input QueryBuilder-Input FormControl-medium" aria-controls="query-builder-test-results" aria-autocomplete="list" aria-haspopup="listbox" style="width: 300px;">
          </div>

          <span class="sr-only" id="query-builder-test-clear">Clear</span>
          <button role="button" id="query-builder-test-clear-button" aria-labelledby="query-builder-test-clear query-builder-test-label" data-target="query-builder.clearButton" data-action="

        <div id="responsive-meta-container" data-turbo-replace="">
      <div class="d-block d-md-none mb-2 px-3 px-md-4 px-lg-5">
      <p class="f4 mb-3 ">
        Run AI models locally on your machine with node.js bindings for llama.cpp. Force a JSON schema on the model output on the generation level
      </p>
      <div class="mb-2 d-flex flex-items-center Link--secondary">

  </div>

  



<turbo-frame id="repo-content-turbo-frame" target="_top" data-turbo-action="advance" class="">
    <div id="repo-content-pjax-container" class="repository-content ">
    



    
      
  <h1 class="sr-only">withcatai/node-llama-cpp</h1>
  <div class="clearfix container-xl px-md-4 px-lg-5 px-3">
    <div>

  <div id="spoof-warning" class="mt-0 pb-3" hidden="" aria-hidden="">
  <div data-view-component="true" class="flash flash-warn mt-0 clearfix">
  
    <svg aria-hidden="true" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" data-view-component="true" class="octicon octicon-alert float-left mt-1">
    <path d="M6.457 1.047c.659-1.234 2.427-1.234 3.086 0l6.082 11.378A1.75 1.75 0 0 1 14.082 15H1.918a1.75 1.75 0 0 1-1.543-2.575Zm1.763.707a.25.25 0 0 0-.44 0L1.698 13.132a.25.25 0 0 0 .22.368h12.164a.25.25 0 0 0 .22-.368Zm.53 3.996v2.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.5 0v-2.5a.75.75 0 0 1 1.5 0ZM9 11a1 1 0 1 1-2 0 1 1 0 0 1 2 0Z"></path>
</svg>

      <div class="overflow-hidden">This commit does not belong to any branch on this repository, and may belong to a fork outside of the repository.</div>


  
</div></div>

class="react-directory-filename-column"><svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="img" class="icon-directory" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16" fill="currentColor" style="display: inline-block; user-select: none; vertical-align: text-bottom; overflow: visible;"><path d="M1.75 1A1.75 1.75 0 0 0 0 2.75v10.5C0 14.216.784 15 1.75 15h12.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 0 16 13.25v-8.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 0 14.25 3H7.5a.25.25 0 0 1-.2-.1l-.9-1.2C6.07 1.26 5.55 1 5 1H1.75Z"></path></svg><div class="overflow-hidden"><div class="react-directory-filename-cell"><div class="react-directory-truncate"><a title="assets" aria-label="assets, (Directory)" class="Link--primary" href="/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/tree/master/assets">assets</a></div></div></div></div></td><td class="react-directory-row-commit-cell"><div><div class="react-directory-commit-message"><a data-pjax="true" title="chore: remove Git LFS because it's expensive for open-source projects (#167)

Weirdly, hosting an open-source Git project on GitHub is free, but Git LFS for such projects costs money.
GitHub charges for every `git clone` that downloads the LFS objects, even when cloned by people who are not even members of the project.

This repo had 14MB of git LFS objects, and the free monthly quota of 1GB bandwidth of LFS objects was reached very quickly due to people cloning this repo.
GitHub should do something about this since it's stupid to make people use regular Git for non-textual files for open-source projects just because it's free.
It doesn't make sense to make regular git free for open-source projects and, at the same time, charge for the bandwidth of LFS objects that are so small for these projects." class="Link--secondary" href="/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/commit/ec4b90ac3b92257b427ae4f9be5b69e93264dc3e">chore: remove Git LFS because it's expensive for open-source projects (</a><a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="2145117579" data-permission-text="Title is private" data-url="https://github.com/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/issues/167" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/pull/167/hovercard" href="https://github.com/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/pull/167"></a></div></div></td><td><div class="react-directory-commit-age"><relative-time class="sc-bcXHqe" tense="past" datetime="2024-02-20T22:42:22.000Z" title="Feb 20, 2024, 11:42 PM GMT+1">Feb 20, 2024</relative-time></div></td></tr><tr class="react-directory-row undefined" id="folder-row-5"><td class="react-directory-row-name-cell-small-screen" colspan="2"><div class="react-directory-filename-column"><svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="img" class="icon-directory" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16" fill="currentColor" style="display: inline-block; user-select: none; vertical-align: text-bottom; overflow: visible;"><path d="M1.75 1A1.75 1.75 0 0 0 0 2.75v10.5C0 14.216.784 15 1.75 15h12.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 0 16 13.25v-8.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 0 14.25 3H7.5a.25.25 0 0 1-.2-.1l-.9-1.2C6.07 1.26 5.55 1 5 1H1.75Z"></path></svg><div class="overflow-hidden"><div class="react-directory-filename-cell"><div class="react-directory-truncate"><a title="docs" aria-label="docs, (Directory)" class="Link--primary" href="/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/tree/master/docs">docs</a></div></div></div></div></td><td class="react-directory-row-name-cell-large-screen" colspan="1"><div class="react-directory-filename-column"><svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="img" class="icon-directory" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16" fill="currentColor" style="display: inline-block; user-select: none; vertical-align: text-bottom; overflow: visible;"><path d="M1.75 1A1.75 1.75 0 0 0 0 2.75v10.5C0 14.216.784 15 1.75 15h12.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 0 16 13.25v-8.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 0 14.25 3H7.5a.25.25 0 0 1-.2-.1l-.9-1.2C6.07 1.26 5.55 1 5 1H1.75Z"></path></svg><div class="overflow-hidden"><div class="react-directory-filename-cell"><div class="react-directory-truncate"><a title="docs" aria-label="docs, (Directory)" class="Link--primary" href="/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/tree/master/docs">docs</a></div></div></div></div></td><td class="react-directory-row-commit-cell"><div><div class="react-directory-commit-message"><a data-pjax="true" title="chore: remove Git LFS because it's expensive for open-source projects (#167)

Weirdly, hosting an open-source Git project on GitHub is free, but Git LFS for such projects costs money.
GitHub charges for every `git clone` that downloads the LFS objects, even when cloned by people who are not even members of the project.

This repo had 14MB of git LFS objects, and the free monthly quota of 1GB bandwidth of LFS objects was reached very quickly due to people cloning this repo.
GitHub should do something about this since it's stupid to make people use regular Git for non-textual files for open-source projects just because it's free.
It doesn't make sense to make regular git free for open-source projects and, at the same time, charge for the bandwidth of LFS objects that are so small for these projects." class="Link--secondary" href="/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/commit/ec4b90ac3b92257b427ae4f9be5b69e93264dc3e">chore: remove Git LFS because it's expensive for open-source projects (</a><a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-hovercard-url="/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/pull/167/hovercard" href="https://github.com/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/pull/167"></a></div></div></td><td><div user-select: none; vertical-align: text-bottom; overflow: visible;"><path d="M2 1.75C2 .784 2.784 0 3.75 0h6.586c.464 0 .909.184 1.237.513l2.914 2.914c.329.328.513.773.513 1.237v9.586A1.75 1.75 0 0 1 13.25 16h-9.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 1 2 14.25Zm1.75-.25a.25.25 0 0 0-.25.25v12.5c0 .138.112.25.25.25h9.5a.25.25 0 0 0 .25-.25V6h-2.75A1.75 1.75 0 0 1 9 4.25V1.5Zm6.75.062V4.25c0 .138.112.25.25.25h2.688l-.011-.013-2.914-2.914-.013-.011Z"></path></svg><div class="overflow-hidden"><div class="react-directory-filename-cell"><div class="react-directory-truncate"><a title=".gitignore" aria-label=".gitignore, (File)" class="Link--primary" href="/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/blob/master/.gitignore">.gitignore</a></div></div></div></div></td><td class="react-directory-row-commit-cell"><div><div class="react-directory-commit-message"><a data-pjax="true" title="chore: remove Git LFS because it's expensive for open-source projects (#167)

Weirdly, hosting an open-source Git project on GitHub is free, but Git LFS for such projects costs money.
GitHub charges for every `git clone` that downloads the LFS objects, even when cloned by people who are not even members of the project.

This repo had 14MB of git LFS objects, and the free monthly quota of 1GB bandwidth of LFS objects was reached very quickly due to people cloning this repo.
GitHub should do something about this since it's stupid to make people use regular Git for non-textual files for open-source projects just because it's free.
It doesn't make sense to make regular git free for open-source projects and, at the same time, charge for the bandwidth of LFS objects that are so small for these projects." class="Link--secondary" href="/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/commit/ec4b90ac3b92257b427ae4f9be5b69e93264dc3e">chore: remove Git LFS because it's expensive for open-source projects (</a><a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="2145117579" data-permission-text="Title is private" data-url="https://github.com/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/issues/167" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/pull/167/hovercard" href="https://github.com/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/pull/167"></a></div></div></td><td><div class="react-directory-commit-age"><relative-time class="sc-bcXHqe" tense="past" datetime="2024-02-20T22:42:22.000Z" title="Feb 20, 2024, 11:42 PM GMT+1">Feb 20, 2024</relative-time></div></td></tr><tr class="react-directory-row truncate-for-mobile" id="folder-row-13"><td class="react-directory-row-name-cell-small-screen" colspan="2"><div class="react-directory-filename-column"><svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="img" class="color-fg-muted" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16" fill="currentColor" style="display: inline-block; class="react-directory-row-commit-cell"><div><div class="react-directory-commit-message"><a data-pjax="true" title="fix: bugs (#80)

* feat: adapt to the latest `llama.cpp` interface
* feat: print helpful information to help resolve a clone issue when it happens
* feat: print helpful information to help resolve build issues related to CUDA
* feat: make portable cmake on Windows more stable
* feat: update `CMakeLists.txt` to match `llama.cpp` better
* fix: do not download redundant node headers
* fix: improve cmake custom options handling
* fix: do not set `CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET` for CUDA
* fix: do not fetch information from GitHub when using a local git bundle
* fix: GBNF JSON schema string const formatting
* docs: document a solution to a compilation problem on macOS
* docs: document more CUDA build error solutions
* docs: explain about ES modules in the getting started guide
* chore: update `.commitlintrc.json`

itemprop="text"><div align="center" dir="auto">
    <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/master/assets/logo.roundEdges.png"><img alt="node-llama-cpp Logo" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/master/assets/logo.roundEdges.png" width="360px" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
    <div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">node-llama-cpp</h1><a id="user-content-node-llama-cpp" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: node-llama-cpp" href="#node-llama-cpp"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
    <p dir="auto">Run AI models locally on your machine</p>
    <sub>Pre-built bindings are provided with a fallback to building from source with cmake</sub>
    <p dir="auto"></p>
</div>
<div align="center" dir="auto">
<p dir="auto"><a href="https://github.com/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/actions/workflows/build.yml"><img src="https://github.com/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/actions/workflows/build.yml/badge.svg" alt="Build" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/node-llama-cpp" rel="nofollow"><img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/63e71e3508c7877fa1bef4de57aae1a30e7c9643b84cf7a00d016a1bc702db40/68747470733a2f2f62616467656e2e6e65742f62616467652f636f6c6f722f4d49542f677265656e3f6c6162656c3d6c6963656e7365" alt="License" data-canonical-src="https://badgen.net/badge/color/MIT/green?label=license" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/node-llama-cpp" rel="nofollow"><img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/72c558797537347555bee13547ec128a01fd598073bafd6c4dfbe01e83892e35/68747470733a2f2f62616467656e2e6e65742f62616467652f636f6c6f722f547970655363726970742f626c75653f6c6162656c3d7479706573" alt="License" data-canonical-src="https://badgen.net/badge/color/TypeScript/blue?label=types" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/node-llama-cpp" rel="nofollow"><img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/eed47677dcb505030a6d6f7f3f103249d432cd027e79ddffd1f8b3bd59f51e42/68747470733a2f2f62616467656e2e6e65742f6e706d2f762f6e6f64652d6c6c616d612d637070" alt="Version" data-canonical-src="https://badgen.net/npm/v/node-llama-cpp" style="max-width: 100%;"></a></p>
</div>
<p dir="auto"> New! <a href="https://github.com/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/pull/105" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/pull/105/hovercard">Try the beta of version <code>3.0.0</code></a>  (included: function calling, automatic chat wrapper detection, embedding support, and more)</p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Features</h2><a id="user-content-features" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Features" href="#features"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Run a text generation model locally on your machine</li>
<li>Metal and CUDA support</li>
<li>Pre-built binaries are provided, with a fallback to building from source without <code>node-gyp</code> or Python</li>
<li>Chat with a model using a chat wrapper</li>
<li>Use the CLI to chat with a model without writing any code</li>
<li>Up-to-date with the latest version of <code>llama.cpp</code>. Download and compile the latest release with a single CLI command.</li>
<li>Force a model to generate output in a parseable format, like JSON, or even force it to follow a specific JSON schema</li>
</ul>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><a href="https://withcatai.github.io/node-llama-cpp/" rel="nofollow">Documentation</a></h2><a id="user-content-documentation" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Documentation" href="#documentation"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://withcatai.github.io/node-llama-cpp/guide/" rel="nofollow">Getting started guide</a></li>
<li><a href="https://withcatai.github.io/node-llama-cpp/api/classes/LlamaModel" rel="nofollow">API reference</a></li>
<li><a href="https://withcatai.github.io/node-llama-cpp/guide/cli/" rel="nofollow">CLI help</a></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/releases">Changelog</a></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/orgs/withcatai/projects/1">Roadmap</a></li>
</ul>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Installation</h2><a id="user-content-installation" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Installation" href="#installation"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto"><pre>npm install --save node-llama-cpp</pre><div class="zeroclipboard-container">
    <clipboard-copy aria-label="Copy" class="ClipboardButton btn btn-invisible js-clipboard-copy m-2 p-0 tooltipped-no-delay d-flex flex-justify-center flex-items-center" data-copy-feedback="Copied!" data-tooltip-direction="w" value="npm install --save node-llama-cpp" tabindex="0" role="button">
      <svg aria-hidden="true" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" data-view-component="true" class="octicon octicon-copy js-clipboard-copy-icon">
    <path d="M0 6.75C0 5.784.784 5 1.75 5h1.5a.75.75 0 0 1 0 1.5h-1.5a.25.25 0 0 0-.25.25v7.5c0 .138.112.25.25.25h7.5a.25.25 0 0 0 .25-.25v-1.5a.75.75 0 0 1 1.5 0v1.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 1 9.25 16h-7.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 1 0 14.25Z"></path><path d="M5 1.75C5 .784 5.784 0 6.75 0h7.5C15.216 0 16 .784 16 1.75v7.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 1 14.25 11h-7.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 1 5 9.25Zm1.75-.25a.25.25 0 0 0-.25.25v7.5c0 .138.112.25.25.25h7.5a.25.25 0 0 0 .25-.25v-7.5a.25.25 0 0 0-.25-.25Z"></path>
</svg>
      <svg aria-hidden="true" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" data-view-component="true" class="octicon octicon-check js-clipboard-check-icon color-fg-success d-none">
    <path d="M13.78 4.22a.75.75 0 0 1 0 1.06l-7.25 7.25a.75.75 0 0 1-1.06 0L2.22 9.28a.751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018L6 10.94l6.72-6.72a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06 0Z"></path>
</svg>
    </clipboard-copy>
  </div></div>
<p dir="auto">This package comes with pre-built binaries for macOS, Linux and Windows.</p>
<p dir="auto">If binaries are not available for your platform, it'll fallback to download the latest version of <code>llama.cpp</code> and build it from source with <code>cmake</code>.
To disable this behavior set the environment variable <code>NODE_LLAMA_CPP_SKIP_DOWNLOAD</code> to <code>true</code>.</p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Usage</h2><a id="user-content-usage" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Usage" href="#usage"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-ts notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto"><pre><span class="pl-k">import</span> <span class="pl-kos">{</span><span class="pl-s1">fileURLToPath</span><span class="pl-kos">}</span> <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"url"</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
<span class="pl-k">import</span> <span class="pl-s1">path</span> <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"path"</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
<span class="pl-k">import</span> <span class="pl-kos">{</span><span class="pl-smi">LlamaModel</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> <span class="pl-smi">LlamaContext</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> <span class="pl-smi">LlamaChatSession</span><span class="pl-kos">}</span> <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"node-llama-cpp"</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>

<span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-s1">__dirname</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-s1">path</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">dirname</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-en">fileURLToPath</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-k">import</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-c1">meta</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-c1">url</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>

<span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-s1">model</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">LlamaModel</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">{</span>
    <span class="pl-c1">modelPath</span>: <span class="pl-s1">path</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">join</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s1">__dirname</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> <span class="pl-s">"models"</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> <span class="pl-s">"codellama-13b.Q3_K_M.gguf"</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span>
<span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
<span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-s1">context</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">LlamaContext</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">{</span>model<span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
<span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-s1">session</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">LlamaChatSession</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">{</span>context<span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>


<span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-s1">q1</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-s">"Hi there, how are you?"</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
<span class="pl-smi">console</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">log</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s">"User: "</span> <span class="pl-c1">+</span> <span class="pl-s1">q1</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>

<span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-s1">a1</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">await</span> <span class="pl-s1">session</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">prompt</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s1">q1</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
<span class="pl-smi">console</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">log</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s">"AI: "</span> <span class="pl-c1">+</span> <span class="pl-s1">a1</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>


<span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-s1">q2</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-s">"Summerize what you said"</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
<span class="pl-smi">console</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">log</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s">"User: "</span> <span class="pl-c1">+</span> <span class="pl-s1">q2</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>

<span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-s1">a2</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">await</span> <span class="pl-s1">session</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">prompt</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s1">q2</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
<span class="pl-smi">console</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">log</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s">"AI: "</span> <span class="pl-c1">+</span> <span class="pl-s1">a2</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span></pre><div class="zeroclipboard-container">
    <clipboard-copy aria-label="Copy" class="ClipboardButton btn btn-invisible js-clipboard-copy m-2 p-0 tooltipped-no-delay d-flex flex-justify-center flex-items-center" data-copy-feedback="Copied!" data-tooltip-direction="w" value="import {fileURLToPath} from &quot;url&quot;;
import path from &quot;path&quot;;
import {LlamaModel, LlamaContext, LlamaChatSession} from &quot;node-llama-cpp&quot;;

const __dirname = path.dirname(fileURLToPath(import.meta.url));

const model = new LlamaModel({
    modelPath: path.join(__dirname, &quot;models&quot;, &quot;codellama-13b.Q3_K_M.gguf&quot;)
});
const context = new LlamaContext({model});
const session = new LlamaChatSession({context});


const q1 = &quot;Hi there, how are you?&quot;;
console.log(&quot;User: &quot; + q1);

const a1 = await session.prompt(q1);
console.log(&quot;AI: &quot; + a1);


const q2 = &quot;Summerize what you said&quot;;
console.log(&quot;User: &quot; + q2);

const a2 = await session.prompt(q2);
console.log(&quot;AI: &quot; + a2);" tabindex="0" role="button">
      <svg aria-hidden="true" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" data-view-component="true" class="octicon octicon-copy js-clipboard-copy-icon">
    <path d="M0 6.75C0 5.784.784 5 1.75 5h1.5a.75.75 0 0 1 0 1.5h-1.5a.25.25 0 0 0-.25.25v7.5c0 .138.112.25.25.25h7.5a.25.25 0 0 0 .25-.25v-1.5a.75.75 0 0 1 1.5 0v1.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 1 9.25 16h-7.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 1 0 14.25Z"></path><path d="M5 1.75C5 .784 5.784 0 6.75 0h7.5C15.216 0 16 .784 16 1.75v7.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 1 14.25 11h-7.5A1.75 1.75 0 0 1 5 9.25Zm1.75-.25a.25.25 0 0 0-.25.25v7.5c0 .138.112.25.25.25h7.5a.25.25 0 0 0 .25-.25v-7.5a.25.25 0 0 0-.25-.25Z"></path>
</svg>
      <svg aria-hidden="true" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" data-view-component="true" class="octicon octicon-check js-clipboard-check-icon color-fg-success d-none">
    <path d="M13.78 4.22a.75.75 0 0 1 0 1.06l-7.25 7.25a.75.75 0 0 1-1.06 0L2.22 9.28a.751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018L6 10.94l6.72-6.72a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06 0Z"></path>
</svg>
    </clipboard-copy>
  </div></div>
<blockquote>
<p dir="auto">For more examples, see the <a href="https://withcatai.github.io/node-llama-cpp/guide/" rel="nofollow">getting started guide</a></p>
</blockquote>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Contributing</h2><a id="user-content-contributing" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Contributing" href="#contributing"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto">To contribute to <code>node-llama-cpp</code> read the <a href="https://withcatai.github.io/node-llama-cpp/guide/contributing" rel="nofollow">contribution guide</a>.</p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Acknowledgements</h2><a id="user-content-acknowledgements" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Acknowledgements" href="#acknowledgements"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>

      <div class="BorderGrid about-margin" data-pjax="">
        <div class="BorderGrid-row">
          <div class="BorderGrid-cell">
            <div class="hide-sm hide-md">
  <h2 class="mb-3 h4">About</h2>

      <p class="f4 my-3">
        Run AI models locally on your machine with node.js bindings for llama.cpp. Force a JSON schema on the model output on the generation level
      </p>
      <div class="my-3 d-flex flex-items-center">
        <svg aria-hidden="true" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" data-view-component="true" class="octicon octicon-link flex-shrink-0 mr-2">
    <path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path>
</svg>
        <span class="flex-auto min-width-0 css-truncate css-truncate-target width-fit">
          <a title="https://withcatai.github.io/node-llama-cpp/" role="link" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="text-bold" href="https://withcatai.github.io/node-llama-cpp/">withcatai.github.io/node-llama-cpp/</a>
        </span>
      </div>

    <h3 class="sr-only">Topics</h3>
    <div class="my-3">
        <div class="f6">
      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:nodejs" href="/topics/nodejs" title="Topic: nodejs" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">
  nodejs
</a>
      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:cmake" href="/topics/cmake" title="Topic: cmake" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">
  cmake
</a>
      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:ai" href="/topics/ai" title="Topic: ai" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">
  ai
</a>
      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:metal" href="/topics/metal" title="Topic: metal" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">
  metal
</a>
      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:json-schema" href="/topics/json-schema" title="Topic: json-schema" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">
  json-schema
</a>
      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:grammar" href="/topics/grammar" title="Topic: grammar" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">
  grammar
</a>
      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:cuda" href="/topics/cuda" title="Topic: cuda" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">
  cuda
</a>
      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:self-hosted" href="/topics/self-hosted" title="Topic: self-hosted" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">
  self-hosted
</a>
      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:bindings" href="/topics/bindings" title="Topic: bindings" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">
  bindings
</a>
      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:llama" href="/topics/llama" title="Topic: llama" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">
  llama
</a>
      <a data-ga-click="Topic, repository page" data-octo-click="topic_click" data-octo-dimensions="topic:cmake-js" href="/topics/cmake-js" title="Topic: cmake-js" data-view-component="true" class="topic-tag topic-tag-link">

            <div class="BorderGrid-row">

                <h2 class="h4 mb-3">
  <a href="/withcatai/node-llama-cpp/graphs/contributors" data-view-component="true" class="Link--primary no-underline Link d-flex flex-items-center">
